name: Jewel Hunter Unity Template
description:
Jewel Hunter is trending Match 3 – game puzzle game on Google Play and App Store .This game helps you reduce time to build a similar game easy. You do not need to know any programming language to configure and use it. It is very easy to fill it with your own tasks, make UI changes,change your Admod, Unity, IronSource ID start to gain experience in promoting your game and earning money. We will support you until you feel the most satisfaction for this asset.

Flash Sales : Only 59$ for the first 5 buyers

Requirements :
  • Unity free license version 2020 or later
  • MacOS and Xcode for build iOS
Game Features:
  • This is a completed game designer, sound, effects, gameplay,full resource, full animation, for such a full sound
  • Amazing system level: Over 700 levels well done.
  • Levels Locking type Stage: Levels can be locked and can be unlocked by the players pass the levels.
  • Easy Reskin: Easy-to-use to change the picture of your game
  • Ads Monetization : Admob, Unity Ads, IronSource, Applovin Ads integrated (Banner, Interstitial, Video Reward)
  • Rewarded Ads (get coins, continue game stage ).
  • Booster Systems: Players can spend coins to use the Bomb, Hammer, Rocket,… power up if they get stuck.
  • Lucky Spin: Players can receive free items.
  • Sounds: Background music and sound effects are included with a settings to mute sounds in the game
  • Multiple screen sizing for most mobile devices
  • Professional and clean code, clean projects
  • Simple and attractive
  • Easy reskin for all platform.
  • New Developer friendly
  • Support multi-platform: Android, iOS
  • Support for Unity 2020 or higher
  • Support build 64Bit, API Latest, Android 13
  • Support build Android App Bundle (AAB)
  • Documents update online,visual tutorial, Support 24/7
This pack includes :
  • Full game ready to publish, easy reskined
  • Clear documentation, video guide, demo apk
